data.title: South China Morning Post
data.meta_description: Harvey joined the Post in 2021. He graduated from the University of Hong Kong with a double major in Journalism and Politics and Public Administration. Prior to joining the Post, he was a freelance multimedia journalist, stringing with news outlets such as the Associated Press, Agence France-Presse and others.
data.text:
In videos of her performances shared online, B-Girl Raygun was seen hopping around like a kangaroo, touching her toes while lying down and seemingly squirming around on the dance floor.

Company says drivers can earn HK$21,000 a month and HK$6,000 bonus, in package similar to those working five days straight with single day off.

Sports chief Kevin Yeung also calls on business community to consider hiring retired athletes due to their ability to face adversity.

‘In recent years, there have been tragic incidents from time to time when carers succumb to unbearable pressure,’ watchdog says.

Lawmaker Benson Luk says city must go beyond increasing local spectatorship and increase scale of sports events to draw more overseas athletes

Police say issue with train’s braking system believed to have caused incident.

Dog dies after being hit by a white Mercedes-Benz on Long Tin Road, dashcam footage shows.

The 20-year-old follows Turkish pistol shooter Yusuf Dikec and South Korea’s Kim Ye-ji, whose contrasting demeanours made them the targets for viral content.

Hong Kong Internet Registration Corporation says 44 per cent of websites it examined use unsafe hyperlinks to third-party services.

Carrier adds to haul of perks for Cheung Ka-long, Vivian Kong and Siobhan Haughey, with medal winners from Olympics and Paralympics eligible.

Police investigating death of man, 59, who passed out while driving into a car park at Hong Kong International Airport at 5.14am on Friday.

Pair chosen in recognition of their longevity and as inspiration to country’s rising stars, official says.

‘My favourite thing is to have my feathers brushed by carers and eat very tasty fruit,’ Facebook post says.

Ticket prices do not include fuel charges and relevant taxes, with passengers required to travel on dates between August 18 and December 18.

Agriculture, Fisheries and Conservation Department says no one has come forward to claim big flightless bird as search for new home continues.

DAB and New People’s Party call for changes to spirits tax, saying move will bolster city’s status as hub for selling, auctioning liquor.

City leader also stresses that young people may regret their choices and limit their development by focusing on subsidised housing flats.

Airline CEO Ronald Lam mentions plan for mainland Chinese cities of Haikou and Sanya during trip to province, but holds off on timeline.

Head of China’s foreign ministry arm in Hong Kong says dozens of foreign leaders he hosted in Hainan understood legislation is ‘the norm’.

Under terms of the order, Hong Kong no longer receives special economic treatment, nor can sensitive technology be exported to city.

Culture minister Kevin Yeung reveals Mid-Autumn lantern display, free admission to museums as part of slew of citywide National Day events.

Woman is asked to stay at her listed address in Hong Kong, report regularly to Wan Chai Police Station and surrender all her travel documents.
